TextLibrary.Text: Okay, kid. By way of thanks for fighting the Pirates, the lads've fitted your ship with some basic mining equipment. It's portable too, so if you get a new ship, you can just reattach it.
Okay, kid. By way of thanks for fighting the Pirates, the lads've fitted your ship with some basic mining equipment. It's portable too, so if you get a new ship, you can just reattach it.
Thank you. How do I use it?
Thank you. How do I use it?
You don't. I do. I'm going to tag along with you for a bit if you don't mind. I go a bit mad stuck on Erebus Sigma Station all day, it'd be nice to travel on a ship like yours for a bit.
You don't. I do. I'm going to tag along with you for a bit if you don't mind. I go a bit mad stuck on Erebus Sigma Station all day, it'd be nice to travel on a ship like yours for a bit.
